question:
You have seen an advertisement in an Australian magazine for someone to live with a family for six months and look after their six-year-old child.


Write a letter to the parents. In your letterexplain why you would like the jobgive details of why you would be a suitable person to employsay how you would spend your free time while you are in Australia
text: I am writing this letter in regards to the job posting for a caretaker in Australia.

My name is Tushar and I am currently working with the 'early tree' child care agency for the last 2 years, I love to take care of kids and play with them because my childhood was a bit rough and when I am around children I feel good and I always try to live myself through them.

I believe that I acquire all the skills that are required for this position. I have done 'Early childhood program' at Georgian college with honours. Moreover, I have had  a wonderful experience  dealing with children of different age groups. In addition , I am willing to commute and I can easily adjust myself to other people and their requirements.

After work, I have planned to spend my leisure time  visiting places around and exploring the new culture, also a very close friend of mine lives a 15 minutes drive from downtown so I will be visiting her once a week.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
